snippet.title: COLD VR - Launching Jan 21st, 2025 (Meta Quest, PCVR, PS VR2)
snippet.description:
Time is your greatest weapon! Move to slow it down, stop, and risk everything. Launching Jan 21st

PSVR2: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10011757

Meta Quest: https://www.meta.com/en-gb/experiences/cold/27465772306403518/?srsltid=AfmBOop38pi8zMtVSTVDzkN6yOVGB-aOLhjj9RvrHxSoNtW9l8YAtX_U

STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2636890/COLD_VR/
